title: HS30088: Service Sector Economics - Quick Facts
text:
HS30088
Course name | Service Sector Economics
Offered by | Humanities & Social Sciences
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: None Course ContentsIntroduction - Nature, Characteristics and Classification of services; Activities in the Service Sector; Estimating its contribution to GDP in different Developed and Developing Countries, Output and Productivity, Investment requirements; Employment generation; Pricing of Services; Linkages to other sectors; Government policies towards service sector; Reforms in the service sector; Service Marketing.
